title: I bought AirPods Max from a SCALPER!
description: So I had to buy the AirPods Max from a scalper to make this video. I sure hope it was worth it.  Buy Apple AirPods Max headphones  On Amazon (PAID LINK):   On BestBuy (PAID LINK):   Buy Bose Noise Cancelling Headphones 700 On Amazon (PAID LINK):   On Newegg (PAID LINK):  On B&H (PAID LINK):  On BestBuy (PAID LINK):   Buy Sony WH-1000XM4 Headphones On Amazon (PAID LINK):  On Newegg (PAID LINK):      On B&H (PAID LINK):  On BestBuy (PAID LINK):   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.
